distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for SDL2 fixes the following issues:

- Remove the fix for CVE-2019-7637, the modification of function SDL_CalculatePitch is only suited for SDL not SDL2,
  and breaks SDL2 software. (bsc#1134135)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer overflow in SDL_FillRect in video/SDL_surface.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
